blogPost.body: The Fed's Balance Sheet ends the year at $7.36 trillion, an increase of more than $3 trillion from the start of the year. https://t.co/Gye76T0Ssi
blogPost.title: The Fed's Balance Sheet ends the year at $7.36 trillion, an increase of more than $3 trillion from the start of the year. https://t.co/Gye76T0Ssi
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 美联储的资产负债表年底为7.36万亿美元，较年初增加逾3万亿美元。https://t.co/Gye76T0Ssi
美聯儲的資產負債表年底爲7.36萬億美元，較年初增加逾3萬億美元。https://t.co/Gye76T0Ssi

previous.excerpt:
Why did the market react so harshly to the lack of talk about clean energy? Was
it an overreaction or the beginning of a larger term trend for the rest of the
year? Classic buy the rumor, sell the news?

Yesterday's stimulus plan is only the first of two major spending initiatives
Biden will seek in…
previous.title: Biden didn't talk about clean energy in his 1.9T stimulus plan. Clean energy stocks down a lot (ICLN -5.39%, TAN -7.24%, QCLN -5.57%). Is the bull market for them over? Is it going to trade down or sideways this year?

localize.title: 拜登在他的1.9T经济刺激计划中没有谈及清洁能源。清洁能源股票跌幅较大（ICLN -5.39%，TAN -7.24%，QCLN -5.57%）。他们的牛市结束了吗？今年是要下跌还是横盘？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
为什么市场对清洁能源谈虎色变的反应如此激烈？是
是反应过度，还是一个更大的长期趋势的开始？
年？经典的买传闻、卖消息？
